long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Who doesn’t love ice cream?

It’s cold, it’s sweet, it’s creamy, and it’s just plain delicious. As soon as you see a scoop of ice cream, your mouth starts to water.

And now with Scoooop Search, searching the web is just as tasty! Just click search and get ready for a treat. Your new tab will open on an image of a beautiful and delicious Ice Cream that looks good enough to eat!

You’ll have access to the best results on the web—all with a positive and fulfilling background. Scoooop Search is your new companion when you need to find something online. So what are you waiting for? Click Add To Chrome!

The search features within the extension will be provided by Microsoft Bing. However, the extension will not make any changes in your default browser search setting.
